name: The World's Tumorous Growth (LD50)
description:
This is just a simple survival game where you are trying to stop an invasion of weird purple creatures from taking over the world. You will fail. You can not stop them. However you can try and do it as long as you can. I didn’t have time to add audio, so don’t worry, your headphones are indeed working.

I suck at naming games

Controls:

A/D Left/Right - Horizontal Movement

W, Up, Space - Jump/Fly

Left Click/F - Shoot/Drop Enemy

Q - Laser

E - Wall
